about.title: About Us
about.description: SISOBIO is a leader in deep-sea water research and premium salt production
about.subtitle: Deep Sea Water Bio Technology Company
about.description2: Its flagship brand, 'Deungdae Salt The Flake', is crafted using proprietary low-temperature crystallization and layered drying technology, preserving the natural minerals essential to human health such as Na, Mg, Ca, K, and Sr.

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: Beyond salt production, SISOBIO focuses on refining and analyzing deep-sea trace elements to develop functional food ingredients and bio-materials.

partnership.title: Research Collaboration
partnership.content: Through continuous collaboration with the Ceramic Materials Engineering Laboratory of Gangneung-Wonju National University, the company is advancing high-purity sodium and rare-metal extraction technologies, building the foundation for a sustainable ocean-based materials industry.

events: Advanced high-purity sodium and trace element extraction technology, initiated functional food and bio-material research
Launched premium flake salt brand capturing Gangneung's ocean
Launched 'Deungdae Salt The Flake' 3 product variants
Patent No. 10-2722001 'System and Method for Producing Salt Using Deep-Sea Water' registered
Improved mineral preservation through low-temperature crystallization and layered drying process
Established process standardization for mineral analysis and crystal formation
Expanded salt crystallization system experiments based on water quality data from Gangneung and Goseong waters
Patent No. 10-2462843 'Oil Press Machine for Extracting Seed Components of Medicinal Crops' registered
Signed tenancy contract with Goseong Deep Sea Water Industry Promotion Agency
Established deep-sea water mineral-based product development laboratory
Corporation established in Goseong-gun, Gangwon Province
Commenced flake crystal structure stabilization experiments and prototype development
